83429.summary: Some customers in Sault Ste. Marie are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
83429.title: Sept 28 - Sault Ste. Marie | All Services - Outage (Resolved)

83426.summary: Some customers in the Confederation Park area of Saskatoon are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
83426.title: Sept 28 - Saskatoon (Confederation Park) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)
